system.description:
Carved by satyr musicians, this wooden whistle resembles a shushing finger when held to one’s mouth, and blowing through it does not produce an audible sound. Puffing on the whistle as an action allows you to cast the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.4gcxix2l4zvy9kdu]{Message} cantrip once without any other spell components. This ability recharges after 1 week.

Alternatively, you can use an action to blow extremely hard through the whistle to cast the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.kbyg7uvh3w8osgiq]{Sending} spell without seen, vocal, or material components. Unlike the spell, your message can only contain 10 words and there is a 10% chance the message doesn’t arrive (even if you are on the same plane of existence). The whistle is then destroyed in a burst of sparkles.
system.craftingComponents: Gilded feather of an elderly messenger hawk
